p: There are 58 parks in the high turnover trend group, 52 parks in the high potential colonization group, 56 parks in the high potential extirpation group, 46 parks in the intermediate change group, and 62 parks in the low change group ( Fig 3). The distribution of park trends varies by geographic region ( S1 Fig). In summer, the most persistent regions—i.e., the ones with the highest proportion of parks in the low change category—are the Southeast and Pacific West, whereas the Midwest, Northeast, and National Capital regions have more parks with high turnover.
